/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. A large concrete overpass arches over the street, a testament to the city's infrastructure. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene. In the distance, buildings rise, their details softened by the haze. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, which shines brightly in the clear blue sky.
